tweet: I'm grateful for bipartisan support for my amendment that will shed light on how many of these "default proceed" sales occur. With this important information, we can continue to work to make our background check system safer and more efficient. #HR1112 https://schneider.house.gov/media/press-releases/schneider-amendment-enhance-transparency-gun-sales-passes-house-bill-closing …
It's unacceptable that some individuals can get guns before the results of an FBI background check are completed. Today. we voted to close this deadly "Charleston Loophole." #HR1112

Finally. 

I proudly voted today to end Congress’s shameful inaction on gun violence by passing #HR8 a bipartisan bill requiring background checks on all gun sales. With commonsense steps like these to prevent future tragedies, we can honor those we’ve lost. #EnoughIsEnough pic.twitter.com/1hXZZ4Fh5g

This is double taxation and it’s wrong. The SALT restriction was included to put the burden of the new tax law on districts and states like ours. Repealing this unfair measure is a top priority. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1100606489989926912 …

China's unfair trade actions have hurt American businesses, and they deserve to be held to account. But sparking a trade war can't be the answer. This moment is about far more than partisan politics or the merits of a border wall. I hope Senators of both parties will follow suit by putting the good of our county first and voting to defend the Constitution.

I joined a bipartisan majority in the House to vote to reassert our Article I congressional authority and restore the rule of law by terminating the President’s self-serving emergency declaration. https://twitter.com/washingtonpost/status/1100540407346270210 …

We have a responsibility to act on commonsense reforms to our gun laws so more families don’t face this same tragedy. #EnoughisEnough

I am heartbroken that another community so close to our home has been shattered by senseless gun violence. I am grateful for the quick and selfless actions of our first responders, including those who were injured in the line of duty. https://twitter.com/Suntimes/status/1096555701470707712 …

Regardless individual opinions on the wall, this is a moment that transcends partisan politics. I fully support the legislative and judicial effort to counter this egregious executive overreach, and urge my colleagues of all political stripes to join defense of Constitution.
President Trump’s national emergency declaration blatantly disregards our Constitution. If unchecked, it will do great damage to our long-standing system of checks and balances.
Economic development is a top priority in our region, but it does not have to come at the cost of environmental degradation.

Any potential flooding impact of the #Foxconn development on our downstream communities needs to be studied. I'm urging new WI Gov. Tony Evers to re-examine the environmental reviews of the project that his predecessor, Gov. Scott Walker, had waived. https://schneider.house.gov/media/press-releases/schneider-durbin-duckworth-underwood-urge-new-wisconsin-governor-review …

Contrary to the President’s fear-mongering, I remain confident we can successfully work to secure our border and reform our broken immigration system if we commit to work together across the political divide.

This would blatantly disregard our constitutional system of checks and balances, and set a dangerous precedent. I am committed to working with my colleagues in Congress to counter the President’s overreach if he chooses this route.

I’m glad Congress is acting to fund the government and that President Trump will not impose another needless shutdown. But I’m deeply concerned by reports the President plans to declare a national emergency to build his ill-conceived border wall.

We need more information on our communities' exposure to ethylene oxide. I led my colleagues requesting the Agency for Toxic Substances and Diseases Registry undertake a nationwide study on the issue - including in affected communities in Lake County. https://schneider.house.gov/media/press-releases/schneider-lipinski-durbin-duckworth-urge-federal-nationwide-ethylene-oxide …

If you're a veteran who needs assistance, our office is here to help at (847) 383-4870. In last year, we've worked with area veterans to expedite medical appointments, process benefit claims with the VA, secure medals and honors that were earned but never received, and more

The men and women who nobly served our nation deserve to hear thank you throughout the year, not just on Veterans Day. Over the weekend, I distributed #ValentinesforVeterans made by students and constituents to local veterans in North Chicago and Antioch. pic.twitter.com/c40AcU4NST

Our legislation would require the EPA to immediately update its EtO emission standards based on the science, as well as act transparently so affected communities have the most up to date information on any risks. This is about our public health, and delay is unacceptable,

The EPA needs to urgently take all necessary and appropriate steps to protect our communities from the risks of exposure to ethylene oxide – a known carcinogen. https://schneider.house.gov/media/press-releases/schneider-durbin-duckworth-introduce-bills-hold-epa-accountable-poor-oversight …

The death of a child is a loss like no other, but current laws leave no time for parents to grieve and begin to recover before returning to work. Glad to be joined by a bipartisan group including @RepGosar, @RepDonBeyer, @RepWebster, @RepTomSuozzi, and @RepPaulCook to introduce this commonsense and compassionate addition to the #FMLA to help grieving parents,

The death of a child is a loss like no other, yet our current laws leave no time for parents to grieve and begin the recovery process. I introduced legislation with @RepChrisSmith that would require the Special Envoy position be filled and also elevated to the rank of ambassador. It passed the House overwhelmingly in January - a sign of Congress's strong bipartisan commitment to fighting anti-Semitism and hate.

It's good news that President Trump has finally filled the Special Envoy to Monitor and Combat Anti-Semitism position after two years. At a time of dangerous anti-Semitism rising at home and around the world, this vital position cannot sit vacant. https://twitter.com/SecPompeo/status/1092915201274454017 …
